mapper.select: SELECT f.form_id, f.create_time, f.form_name, f.form_path, d.bind_node_ids, d.bind_node_names FROM workflow_form f LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.bind_objid, GROUP_CONCAT(b.node_id) AS bind_node_ids, GROUP_CONCAT(b.node_name) AS bind_node_names FROM workflow_nodebind b WHERE b.def_code = #{bind.defCode} and b.def_version = #{bind.defVersion} and b.bind_type = #{bind.bindType} GROUP BY b.bind_objid) d ON f.form_id = d.bind_objid WHERE d.bind_objid IS NOT NULL ORDER BY f.create_time DESC
